summary.incident:
A perfect lofted pass from Jasper Dahlhaus
finds Paul Gladon (Sittard), who jumps highest
and steers a close-range header into the
right side of the goal. His effort was both
strong and precise, and Ronald Koeman had
no chance of stopping that. 0:1.

Fantastic team goal! Jochem Ritmeester van
de Kamp (Telstar) was set free in the area
by Jeff Hardeveld and made no mistake with
a lovely finish into the bottom right corner.
1:1.

Martijn Vos shows a yellow card to Jochem
Ritmeester van de Kamp (Telstar) for his
blatant foul.

That will be all from Kristoffer Peterson
who is being replaced by the fresh legs
of Makan Aiko (Sittard).

Danny Buijs prepares a substitution. Paul
Gladon is replaced by Kaj Sierhuis (Sittard).

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Mohamed Ihattaren
as he is replaced by Houboulang Mendes (Sittard).

Here comes a substitution. Kay Tejan (Telstar)
is brought on as a substitute for Jochem
Ritmeester van de Kamp.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Dylan Mertens (Telstar)
comes onto the pitch so that Nils Rossen
can be given a rest.

Anthony Correia has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Milan Zonneveld (Telstar)
replacing Dewon Koswal.

The substitution is prepared. Moussa Gbemou
(Sittard) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Justin Lonwijk.

GOAL! Superb work from Dimitrios Limnios,
who plays a vital role in the build-up.
He squares it to Makan Aiko (Sittard), who
beats Ronald Koeman with a brilliant shot
into the left side of the net. 1:2.

Patrick Brouwer goes off the pitch and Neville
Ogidi Nwankwo (Telstar) comes on.

Anthony Correia has decided to make a change.
Sebastian Hagedoorn (Telstar) replaces Tyrese
Noslin.

Goal! The ball breaks to Makan Aiko (Sittard)
after some poor defending, he finds himself
one-on-one with the goalkeeper and calmly
puts the ball into the back of the net!
He makes it 1:3.

Danny Buijs is forced to make a change.
Ryan Fosso (Sittard) is not able to carry
on due to injury. He is replaced by Marko
Kerkez.

Goal! Penetra (AZ Alkmaar) fires the rebound
low into the middle of the goal after the
ball breaks to him in the box. The score
is 0:1.

Penetra (AZ Alkmaar) receives a yellow card
for a nasty tackle.

Denso Kasius (AZ Alkmaar) is cautioned by
the referee for a foul that he committed
a little earlier.

Goal! Bryan Limbombe plays a neat lofted
pass into the box for Damon Mirani (Heracles),
who beats the defender in the air and plants
a header into the left side of the goal
from close range. 1:1.

Yellow card. Mees de Wit (AZ Alkmaar) goes
into the referee's book after a bad challenge.

Substitution. Weslley Patati is replaced
by Isak Jensen (AZ Alkmaar).

Here is a change. Ro-Zangelo Daal is going
off and Maarten Martens gives the last tactical
orders to Ibrahim Sadiq (AZ Alkmaar).

We are about to witness a substitution.
Mario Engels (Heracles) is replacing Yvandro
Borges Sanches.

Substitution. Tristan van Gilst (Heracles)
receives a signal from the referee and is
now allowed to enter the pitch as Thomas
Bruns walks off.

Jordy Clasie (AZ Alkmaar) has tested the
patience of referee Bas Nijhuis and goes
into the book for a previous late challenge.

Ajdin Hrustic (Heracles) goes into the book
for bad language. His vulgar comments could
have made it worse. Luckily for him, it's
a yellow card.

Goal! Kees Smit tees up Mexx Meerdink (AZ
Alkmaar) inside the box, and he keeps his
cool to find the middle of the goal. 1:2.

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Sven Mijnans will be replaced by Matej Sin
(AZ Alkmaar).

Bas Sibum has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Jan Zamburek (Heracles) replacing
Ajdin Hrustic.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Luka Kulenovic (Heracles)
comes onto the pitch so that Bryan Limbombe
can be given a rest.

Bas Sibum has decided to make a change.
Walid Ould Chikh (Heracles) replaces Djevencio
van der Kust.

Here comes a substitution. Mexx Meerdink
is given a rest as he is replaced by Lequincio
Zeefuik (AZ Alkmaar).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Peer Koopmeiners (AZ
Alkmaar) is coming onto the pitch as Kees
Smit cannot continue after picking up an
injury.

This is a yellow card! Lequincio Zeefuik
(AZ Alkmaar) is not happy with the decision,
but from our point of view it was clear.

Marvin Peersman (Groningen) goes into the
book for a horrible tackle. A yellow card
is necessary in this case.

The teams are back out for the second half
and here is a change on the pitch. Ron Jans
gives a chance to Michael Brouwer (Utrecht)
and Vasilis Barkas is off.

There will be a change on the pitch for
the second half. Ron Jans probably wasn't
satisfied with the performance of Davy van
den Berg. He is replaced by Sebastien Haller
(Utrecht).

Marc Nagtegaal shows a yellow card to Younes
Taha (Groningen) for his blatant foul.

Here is a change. Nick Viergever is going
off and Ron Jans gives the last tactical
orders to Derry Murkin (Utrecht).

The referee signals a substitution. Miliano
Jonathans (Utrecht) is brought on as a substitute
for Adrian Blake.

Ron Jans has decided to make a change. Can
Bozdogan (Utrecht) replaces Miguel Rodriguez.

Substitution. David van der Werff will be
replaced by Tygo Land (Groningen).

It's time for a substitution. Tyrique Mercera
(Groningen) comes on in place of Marco Rente.

Dick Lukkien has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Oskar Zawada (Groningen) replacing
Younes Taha.

This is a yellow card! Oskar Zawada (Groningen)
is not happy with the decision, but from
our point of view it was clear.

Stije Resink (Groningen) is booked after
bringing down an opponent. Marc Nagtegaal
had an easy-decision to make.

Jeroen Manschot shows a yellow card to Noah
Naujoks (Excelsior) for a tough tackle.

Jens Toornstra (Sparta Rotterdam) sees a
yellow card from Jeroen Manschot after he
sent one of the opposing players to the
ground.

Ilias Bronkhorst (Excelsior) can't expect
anything else than a yellow card for his
hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Jeroen
Manschot didn't think twice about pulling
it out of his pocket.

Substitution. Mike van Duinen (Excelsior)
has come on for Szymon Wlodarczyk.

Ruben den Uil has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Chris Nadje (Excelsior) replacing
Noah Naujoks.

Jeroen Manschot shows the yellow card to
Arthur Zagre (Excelsior) for a heavy challenge.

Here comes a substitution. Pelle Clement
is given a rest as he is replaced by Lance
Duijvestijn (Sparta Rotterdam).

Maurice Steijn has decided to substitute
Sayfallah Ltaief and he is replaced by Ayoub
Oufkir (Sparta Rotterdam).

We are about to witness a substitution.
Stefan Mitrovic (Excelsior) is replacing
Derensili Sanches Fernandes.

Substitution. Do-Young Yoon (Excelsior)
receives a signal from the referee and is
now allowed to enter the pitch as Gyan de
Regt walks off.

Sending-off! Arthur Zagre (Excelsior) sees
a second yellow card, followed by a red,
and won't take part in the rest of the game.

Ruben den Uil has decided to make a change.
Simon Janssen (Excelsior) replaces Adam
Carlen.

Here's the change. Teo Quintero leaves the
pitch and Jonathan de Guzman (Sparta Rotterdam)
comes on as a substitute.

Ayoub Oufkir (Sparta Rotterdam) latches
onto a cross in the penalty area and fires
the ball into the bottom right corner!

Maurice Steijn prepares a substitution.
Mitchell van Bergen is replaced by Tijs
Velthuis (Sparta Rotterdam).

Nikolai Hopland doesn't have to suffer any
longer with the painful injury as Hristiyan
Petrov (Heerenveen) comes onto the pitch
to replace him.

Anel Ahmedhodzic (Feyenoord) is awarded
a yellow card for his behaviour.

The whistle blows and Hristiyan Petrov (Heerenveen)
is booked for an infringement.

Anis Hadj Moussa (Feyenoord) breaks through
before collecting a brilliant pass and producing
a precise strike to beat the goalkeeper.
The ball went into the bottom left corner.

The goal by Feyenoord is DISALLOWED on the
advice of the video assistant referee due
to an offside.

Robin Hensgens shows a yellow card to Anis
Hadj Moussa (Feyenoord), who isn't surprised
as the tackle was really hard and late.

Substitution. Sem Steijn will be replaced
by Aymen Sliti (Feyenoord).

Robin van Persie prepares a substitution.
Givairo Read is replaced by Bart Nieuwkoop
(Feyenoord).

The game has come to an end for Maxence
Rivera. He has contributed as much as he
could today. He will be replaced by the
fresh legs of Amourricho van Axel Dongen
(Heerenveen).

Robin Veldman has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Vaclav Sejk (Heerenveen) replacing
Ringo Meerveld.

Hristiyan Petrov (Heerenveen) is told to
leave the pitch by the referee after receiving
a yellow card for misconduct!

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Ayase Ueda as he is
replaced by Gaoussou Diarra (Feyenoord).

It will be a substitution. Jaden Slory (Feyenoord)
is ready to enter the pitch as Leo Sauer
walks off.

Sam Kersten goes off the pitch and Maas
Willemsen (Heerenveen) comes on.

Here is a change. Jacob Trenskow is going
off and Robin Veldman gives the last tactical
orders to Marcus Linday (Heerenveen).

Luciano Valente (Feyenoord) earns the yellow
card.

Mohamed Nassoh (NAC Breda) receives a killer
pass, finds himself one-on-one with the
goalkeeper and drills the ball into the
bottom right corner. Magnificent finish!

Ricky van Wolfswinkel (Twente) picks up
a yellow card.

Booking. Boy Kemper (NAC Breda) receives
a caution from the referee.

The whistle blows and Arno Verschueren (Twente)
is booked for an infringement.

The referee signals a substitution. Marko
Pjaca (Twente) is brought on as a substitute
for Daan Rots.

Ivar van Dinteren prepares a substitution.
Sondre Orjasaeter is replaced by Daouda
Weidmann (Twente).

Today's match ends for Arno Verschueren
who will be replaced by Taylor Booth (Twente).

Marko Pjaca (Twente) latches on to an accurate
pass inside the box and finds himself one-on-one
with the goalkeeper. He quickly drills a
shot to the bottom right corner and scores!
His effort went in off the post.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Kristian Hlynsson leaves
the pitch and Thomas van den Belt (Twente)
comes on.

Carl Hoefkens has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Clint Leemans (NAC Breda) replacing
Charles-Andreas Brym.

Goal! Ricky van Wolfswinkel (Twente) wins
the battle of wills and sends an unstoppable
penalty past Daniel Bielica into the bottom
right corner.

Carl Hoefkens has decided to make a change.
Cherrion Valerius (NAC Breda) replaces Mohamed
Nassoh.

Boyd Lucassen comes off the pitch to be
replaced by Dion Versluis (NAC Breda).

It is time for a substitution. Raul Paula
(NAC Breda) is on for Juho Talvitie.

Goal! Boy Kemper puts a cross into the box
and finds Raul Paula (NAC Breda), who latches
on to it and strikes the ball inside the
left post. He makes it 2:2.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Terence Kongolo (NAC Breda)
replaces Kamal Sowah.

Goal! Joris Kramer puts a cross into the
box and finds Jakob Breum (G.A. Eagles),
who latches on to it and strikes the ball
inside the right post. He makes it 1:0.

Victor Edvardsen (G.A. Eagles) picks up
a rebound in the box and unleashes a brilliant
effort, leaving the goalkeeper no chance.

The foul by Mats Deijl (G.A. Eagles) is
worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown
by Serdar Gozubuyuk.

Serdar Gozubuyuk shows a yellow card to
Xavier Mbuyamba (FC Volendam), who isn't
surprised as the tackle was really hard
and late.

Goal! The rebound fell to Mathis Suray (G.A.
Eagles) and he fired home from close range.
The score is 3:0.

Rick Kruys makes a half-time substitution.
Brandley Kuwas comes on in place of Aurelio
Oehlers (FC Volendam).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Ozan Kokcu (FC Volendam)
comes onto the pitch so that Alex Plat can
be given a rest.

Rick Kruys has decided to substitute Robert
Muhren and he is replaced by Robin van Cruijsen
(FC Volendam).

That's the end of the game for Kenzo Goudmijn,
who is replaced by Oscar Pettersson (G.A.
Eagles).

The manager makes a subsitution with Kiano
Dyer (FC Volendam) coming on for Nordin
Bukala.

Here is a change. Dean Ruben James is going
off and Melvin Boel gives the last tactical
orders to Aske Adelgaard (G.A. Eagles).

Substitution. Jakob Breum makes his way
off the pitch and Milan Smit (G.A. Eagles)
comes on as his replacement.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Key-Shawn Wong-A-Soij
(FC Volendam) will replace Joel Ideho.

Melvin Boel has decided to make a change.
Calvin Twigt (G.A. Eagles) replaces Evert
Linthorst.

Ricardo Pepi (PSV) receives a delightful
pass inside the box and smashes a low shot
into the bottom left corner. What a clinical
finish!

Armando Obispo looks very unsteady on his
feet after that head injury. Safety first,
so he’s coming off and Peter Bosz has decided
that Ryan Flamingo (PSV) is the man to take
his place.

Ruben van Bommel (PSV) gets one-on-one with
the goalkeeper and takes an early shot which
finds the back of the net.

Virgil Misidjan (Nijmegen) scores! He latches
on to a pass and produces a perfect strike
from the edge of the box. The ball goes
into the bottom right corner and past the
goalkeeper.

Joey Veerman (PSV) produces a moment of
pure magic and scores a spectacular goal
by striking the ball into the top left corner
of the net!

Bryan Linssen (Nijmegen) can't expect anything
else than a yellow card for his hard tackle.
And a yellow it is. Danny Makkelie didn't
think twice about pulling it out of his
pocket.

Danny Makkelie shows a yellow card to Sami
Ouaissa (Nijmegen), who isn't surprised
as the tackle was really hard and late.

Ivan Perisic sends a precise lofted pass
into the box, Ricardo Pepi (PSV) rises above
the defenders to meet the ball and heads
it straight into the right side of the goal.
The score sheet now reads 1:4.

What a beauty from just outside the box!
Youssef El Kachati (Nijmegen) lashed the
ball with incredible pace and power into
the bottom left corner.

The foul by Ruben van Bommel (PSV) is worthy
of a card and a yellow is duly shown by
Danny Makkelie.

Today's referee Danny Makkelie rightly decides
to book Ismael Saibari (PSV) for his harsh
tackle.

A substitution has been made. Ricardo Pepi
is replaced by Myron Boadu (PSV).

Peter Bosz prepares a substitution. Kiliann
Sildillia is replaced by Anass Salah-Eddine
(PSV).

The manager makes a subsitution with Noe
Lebreton (Nijmegen) coming on for Youssef
El Kachati.

The game has come to an end for Bryan Linssen.
He has contributed as much as he could today.
He will be replaced by the fresh legs of
Kento Shiogai (Nijmegen).

Ryan Flamingo (PSV) is awarded a yellow
card.

What a hit! Tjarron Chery (Nijmegen) shows
good composure inside the box to fire a
first-time shot into the bottom left corner.
3:4.

Myron Boadu (PSV) outjumps the defence inside
the six-yard box to meet the corner kick
and scores with a great header aimed low
into the middle of the goal. The keeper
had no chance to react. The score is 3:5.

We are about to witness a subsitution. Couhaib
Driouech (PSV) for Ruben van Bommel.

Here is a change. Guus Til is going off
and Peter Bosz gives the last tactical orders
to Yarek Gasiorowski (PSV).

Substitution. Koki Ogawa (Nijmegen) has
come on for Brayann Pereira.

Dick Schreuder decides to make a substitution.
Virgil Misidjan will be replaced by Vito
van Crooij (Nijmegen).

It is time for a substitution. Darko Nejasmic
(Nijmegen) is on for Dirk Proper.

Tjarron Chery (Nijmegen) misses the penalty
as he smashes the ball against the crossbar!

Ivan Perisic (PSV) picks up a yellow card
for a foul.

GOAL! Davy Klaassen (Ajax) collects a pass
and from inside the box he lifts the ball
over Tom de Graaff, who was off his line.
What a finish that is! 1:0.

Youri Regeer (Ajax) sees a yellow card from
Sander van der Eijk after he sent one of
the opposing players to the ground.

Mika Godts (Ajax) connects with a pass inside
the box and slams home into the bottom right
corner. The goalkeeper was helpless.

Henry Van Der Vegt makes a switch. Zico
Buurmeester (Zwolle) is coming on in place
of Jamiro Monteiro at the start of the second
period.

A yellow card for a tackle by Owen Wijndal
(Ajax). Sander van der Eijk doesn't hesitate
at all to make this decision.

Sander van der Eijk shows a yellow card
to Ryan Thomas (Zwolle) for a tough tackle.

A substitution has been made. Youri Regeer
goes off and James McConnell (Ajax) comes
on.

Johnny Heitinga has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Josip Sutalo (Ajax) replacing
Ko Itakura.

Substitution. Kenneth Taylor did his best
and is replaced by Oscar Gloukh (Ajax).

Substitution. Oliver Edvardsen (Ajax) replaces
Steven Berghuis.

Henry Van Der Vegt has decided to make a
change. Jan Faberski (Zwolle) replaces Dylan
Mbayo.

Goal! Kaj de Rooij (Zwolle) pounced on a
loose ball inside the penalty area and beats
the goalkeeper with a shot into the bottom
right corner. He makes it 2:1.

The referee signals a substitution. Gabriel
Reiziger (Zwolle) is brought on as a substitute
for Thijs Oosting.

Henry Van Der Vegt decides to make a substitution.
Koen Kostons will be replaced by Shola Shoretire
(Zwolle).

Mika Godts (Ajax) receives a killer pass,
finds himself one-on-one with the goalkeeper
and scores with aplomb inside the left post.
What a beautiful shot.

Substitution. Mika Godts makes his way off
the pitch and Jorthy Mokio (Ajax) comes
on as his replacement.

summary.incident:
Yellow card. Mees de Wit (AZ Alkmaar) goes
into the book for a bad tackle on his opponent.

Sydney van Hooijdonk (NAC Breda) reacts
stupidly and the referee shows him a deserved
red card!

Half-time substitution. Mohamed Nassoh (NAC
Breda) is replaced by Charles-Andreas Brym.

Half-time substitution. Juho Talvitie will
not participate anymore and Cherrion Valerius
(NAC Breda) is coming on.

Ibrahim Sadiq (AZ Alkmaar) has to be very
careful for the rest of the match after
receiving a yellow card from the referee
for a bad tackle on an opponent.

Charles-Andreas Brym (NAC Breda) can't convert
the spot kick. It goes narrowly over the
crossbar. The ball goes out of play and
AZ Alkmaar will have a goal kick.

We are about to witness a subsitution. Weslley
Patati (AZ Alkmaar) for Ibrahim Sadiq.

Maarten Martens decides to make a substitution.
Mees de Wit will be replaced by Sven Mijnans
(AZ Alkmaar).

Leo Greiml (NAC Breda) is being substituted
because of an injury. Carl Hoefkens sends
Enes Mahmutovic on the pitch.

Penetra (AZ Alkmaar) commits a foul and
is shown a yellow card without any hesitation
from the referee.

The substitution is prepared. Lequincio
Zeefuik (AZ Alkmaar) joins the action as
a substitute, replacing Denso Kasius.

Maarten Martens has decided to make a change.
Isak Jensen (AZ Alkmaar) replaces Ro-Zangelo
Daal.

Kees Smit (AZ Alkmaar) is cautioned by the
referee for a foul that he committed a little
earlier.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Matej Sin (AZ Alkmaar)
will replace Kees Smit.

An obvious opportunity for such a good player
like Sven Mijnans (AZ Alkmaar)! He latches
on to a pass to score. Great teamplay!

Substitution. Lewis Holtby is replaced by
Clint Leemans (NAC Breda).

Carl Hoefkens has decided to substitute
Boyd Lucassen and he is replaced by Dion
Versluis (NAC Breda).

Sven Mijnans (AZ Alkmaar) picked up a yellow
card for saying too much to the referee.

Shurandy Sambo (Sparta Rotterdam) receives
a yellow card from the referee for a foul
that he committed a little earlier.

Goal! Jordan Bos (Feyenoord) picks up the
ball from a rebound and from the edge of
the box he unleashes a shot inside the left
post. It's 0:1.

What was Leo Sauer (Feyenoord) thinking?
He will not get away with that. The referee
shows him a yellow card.

Robin van Persie makes a half-time substitution.
Jaden Slory (Feyenoord) comes on in place
of Leo Sauer.

Goal! Ayase Ueda (Feyenoord) pounced on
a loose ball inside the penalty area and
beats the goalkeeper with a shot into the
bottom right corner. He makes it 0:2.

We have witnessed a red card for Bruno Martins
Indi (Sparta Rotterdam).

Luciano Valente (Feyenoord) shouldn't be
surprised it's a yellow from the ref, who
cooled the situation down well.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Sayfallah Ltaief trots off
the pitch and is replaced by Teo Quintero
(Sparta Rotterdam).

Maurice Steijn has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Mike Kleijn (Sparta Rotterdam)
replacing Patrick van Aanholt.

Here comes a substitution. Bart Nieuwkoop
is given a rest as he is replaced by Givairo
Read (Feyenoord).

Goal! Ayase Ueda (Feyenoord) was in the
right place at the right time to get to
the rebound inside the box and gleefully
rifles the ball low inside the left post.
It's 0:3.

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Shurandy Sambo will be replaced by Said
Bakari (Sparta Rotterdam).

Robin van Persie has decided to make a change.
Goncalo Borges (Feyenoord) replaces Anis
Hadj Moussa.

Today's match ends for Ayase Ueda who will
be replaced by Casper Tengstedt (Feyenoord).

Here is a change. Luciano Valente is going
off and Robin van Persie gives the last
tactical orders to Thijs Kraaijeveld (Feyenoord).

Mitchell van Bergen comes off the pitch
to be replaced by Nokkvi Thorisson (Sparta
Rotterdam).

Joshua Gaston Kitolano will be replaced
by Julian Baas (Sparta Rotterdam).

Goal! Quinten Timber (Feyenoord) pounced
on a loose ball inside the penalty area
and beats the goalkeeper with a shot into
the bottom right corner. He makes it 0:4.

Derry Murkin (Utrecht) receives a yellow
card for a nasty tackle.

It's a goal! Derry Murkin plays the ball
to the feet of Davy van den Berg (Utrecht),
who hits a tremendous first-time shot inside
the right post. The goalkeeper was unable
to keep it out. 0:1.

What a hit! Derry Murkin (Utrecht) shows
good composure inside the box to fire a
first-time shot into the bottom right corner.
0:2.

Koen Kostons (Zwolle) is substituted due
to injury. Henry Van Der Vegt gives a chance
to Thomas Buitink.

Ron Jans has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Sebastien Haller (Utrecht) replacing
Mike van der Hoorn.

The referee signals a substitution. Emirhan
Demircan (Utrecht) is brought on as a substitute
for Derry Murkin.

Substitution. Miguel Rodriguez walks off
the pitch and Adrian Blake (Utrecht) comes
on as a substitute.

Substitution. Thijs Oosting is replaced
by Gabriel Reiziger (Zwolle).

Henry Van Der Vegt is forced to make an
unplanned substitution as Dylan Mbayo (Zwolle)
suffers an injury and Samir Lagsir comes
on.

Jamiro Monteiro goes off the pitch and Nick
Fichtinger (Zwolle) comes on.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Can Bozdogan (Utrecht)
is coming onto the pitch as David Min cannot
continue after picking up an injury.

Matisse Didden (Utrecht) just cannot continue
due to injury and has to be substituted.
Mike Eerdhuijzen replaces him.

It's time for a substitution. Jadiel Pereira
da Gama (Zwolle) comes on in place of Sherel
Floranus.

Is that a yellow card in the referee's hand?
It is! Jadiel Pereira da Gama (Zwolle) gets
booked.

Anselmo Garcia MacNulty (Zwolle) receives
a yellow card from the referee for a foul
that he committed a little earlier.

Goal - 1:0! Mohamed Ihattaren (Sittard)
gets a shot away from the edge of the box
and scores into the bottom right corner.
Kristoffer Peterson provided an assist for
the goal.

The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet
of Bryan Linssen (Nijmegen) just outside
the box. He doesn't think twice and fires
a shot towards the middle of the goal, which
Mattijs Branderhorst was unable to keep
it out. 1:1.

Mohamed Ihattaren (Sittard) easily converts
the penalty kick as he sends the ball straight
into the bottom right corner, ricocheting
in off the post. Gonzalo Crettaz was helpless.

Jasper Dahlhaus (Sittard) receives a yellow
card for a nasty tackle.

Tjarron Chery (Nijmegen) argues strongly
with the referee and is awarded a yellow
card. A needless yellow card!

Half-time substitution. Dick Schreuder decided
to make a change. Basar Onal is replaced
by Virgil Misidjan (Nijmegen).

The referee signals a substitution. Kento
Shiogai (Nijmegen) is brought on as a substitute
for Bryan Linssen.

Dick Schreuder has decided to substitute
Rober Gonzalez and he is replaced by Youssef
El Kachati (Nijmegen).

Mattijs Branderhorst (Sittard) is awarded
a yellow card for his behaviour.

A substitution has been made. Mohamed Ihattaren
is replaced by Paul Gladon (Sittard).

Wonderful movement! Sami Ouaissa (Nijmegen)
makes a good run to pick up a cross on the
edge of the box and sends an accurate shot
into the back of the net.

It's time for a substitution. Teo Quintero
(Sparta Rotterdam) comes on in place of
Bruno Martins Indi.

Maurice Steijn has decided to make a change.
Ayoub Oufkir (Sparta Rotterdam) replaces
Sayfallah Ltaief.

The foul by Sergino Dest (PSV) is worthy
of a card and a yellow is duly shown by
Bas Nijhuis.

Substitution. Jerdy Schouten makes way for
Tygo Land (PSV).

That's the end of the game for Sergino Dest,
who is replaced by Kiliann Sildillia (PSV).

Here is a change. Shunsuke Mito is going
off and Maurice Steijn gives the last tactical
orders to Nokkvi Thorisson (Sparta Rotterdam).

Levi Smans floats a lovely ball in from
the free kick to Luuk Brouwers (Heerenveen),
and he strikes the ball inside the left
post to increase the score to 1:0.

Celebrations are cut short for FC Volendam
as the referee indicates NO GOAL after the
VAR review shows it was offside!

The referee looks satisfied after his VAR
review and duly disallows the goal for offside.
The Heerenveen players look gutted.

The substitution is prepared. Marcus Linday
(Heerenveen) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Levi Smans.

Rick Kruys has decided to make a change.
Nordin Bukala (FC Volendam) replaces Alex
Plat.

Ozan Kokcu (FC Volendam) picks up the ball
on the edge of the penalty box and produces
a moment of magic with a brilliant shot
that goes into the left side of the goal!

Today's referee Marc Nagtegaal rightly decides
to book Nordin Bukala (FC Volendam) for
his harsh tackle.

It's time for a substitution. Brandley Kuwas
(FC Volendam) comes on in place of Ozan
Kokcu.

Rick Kruys prepares a substitution. Gibson
Yah is replaced by Milan de Haan (FC Volendam).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Eser Gurbuz (Heerenveen)
replaces Maxence Rivera.

Substitution. Vaclav Sejk (Heerenveen) in,
Dylan Vente out.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Robert Muhren leaves the
pitch and Aaron Meijers (FC Volendam) comes
on.

Rick Kruys has decided to substitute Aurelio
Oehlers and he is replaced by Robin van
Cruijsen (FC Volendam).

Is that a yellow card in the referee's hand?
It is! Sam Kersten (Heerenveen) gets booked.

summary.incident:
Sem Steijn (Feyenoord) unleashes a beautiful
rocket of a shot from a long-range free
kick. The ball goes into the bottom left
corner and leaves the goalkeeper beaten.
This takes hours and hours on the training
ground. The score is 1:0.

Goal! Ayase Ueda (Feyenoord) was in the
right place at the right time to get to
the rebound inside the box and gleefully
rifles the ball low inside the right post.
It's 2:0.

The manager makes a subsitution with Quinten
Timber (Feyenoord) coming on for Luciano
Valente.

Robin van Persie decides to make a substitution.
Jordan Lotomba will be replaced by Jordan
Bos (Feyenoord).

Substitution. Givairo Read makes his way
off the pitch and Bart Nieuwkoop (Feyenoord)
comes on as his replacement.

Kamal Sowah (NAC Breda) sees a yellow card
from Allard Lindhout after he sent one of
the opposing players to the ground.

Bart Nieuwkoop (Feyenoord) fouls his opponent
and receives a yellow card from the referee,
but he is clearly not happy with the decision.

Carl Hoefkens has decided to substitute
Cherrion Valerius and he is replaced by
Pepijn Reulen (NAC Breda).

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Raul Paula (NAC Breda)
is coming onto the pitch as Sydney van Hooijdonk
cannot continue after picking up an injury.

Substitution. Leo Sauer (Feyenoord) replaces
Gaoussou Diarra.

Here comes a substitution. Mohamed Nassoh
is given a rest as he is replaced by Clint
Leemans (NAC Breda).

Here is a change. Ayase Ueda is going off
and Robin van Persie gives the last tactical
orders to Casper Tengstedt (Feyenoord).

Kamal Sowah will be replaced by Dion Versluis
(NAC Breda).

Goal! Basar Onal tees up Dirk Proper (Nijmegen)
on the edge of the box and he fires the
ball into the bottom right corner. 1:0.

Adam Carlen (Excelsior) infringed the rules
and goes into the book. Danny Makkelie pulls
out a yellow card.

Ruben den Uil is forced to make a change.
Stijn van Gassel is unable to continue due
to injury, Tijmen Holla (Excelsior) comes
on.

The game is interrupted. Basar Onal (Nijmegen)
is given a yellow card. He has to be more
careful now.

What a GOAL! The lofted pass into the box
is expertly and acrobatically dispatched
into the net by Koki Ogawa (Nijmegen). 2:0.

Ruben den Uil has decided to substitute
Derensili Sanches Fernandes and he is replaced
by Do-Young Yoon (Excelsior).

GOAL! Basar Onal produces a beautiful lofted
cross into the box, where Koki Ogawa (Nijmegen)
rises high to head the ball into the bottom
right corner and beyond the goalkeeper.
He makes it 3:0.

Goal! Tjarron Chery produces a great pass
that finds Bryan Linssen (Nijmegen) inside
the penalty area, who takes advantage of
the situation to rifle a shot into the bottom
right corner. 4:0.

Substitution. Stijn Middendorp is replaced
by Rick Meissen (Excelsior).

Ruben den Uil prepares a substitution. Mike
van Duinen is replaced by Jerroldino Bergraaf
(Excelsior).

It will be a substitution. Zach Booth (Excelsior)
is ready to enter the pitch as Noah Naujoks
walks off.

The manager has decided to make a substitution
and Basar Onal walks off the pitch to be
replaced by Virgil Misidjan (Nijmegen).

We are about to witness a substitution.
Rober Gonzalez (Nijmegen) is replacing Bryan
Linssen.

Here is a change. Koki Ogawa is going off
and Dick Schreuder gives the last tactical
orders to Youssef El Kachati (Nijmegen).

A substitution has been made. Philippe Sandler
goes off and Sam de Laat (Nijmegen) comes
on.

Goal! Tjarron Chery (Nijmegen) wins the
battle of wills and sends an unstoppable
penalty past Tijmen Holla into right side
of the goal.

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Tjarron Chery will be replaced by Vito van
Crooij (Nijmegen).

This is definitely not what Shawn Adewoye
(Sittard) wanted. Attempting to intercept
an offensive pass, he scored an own goal
and made it 0:1.

Philip Brittijn (Sittard) has a great chance
inside the box and puts the ball into the
back of the net.

Half-time substitution. Melvin Boel decided
to make a change. Richonell Margaret is
replaced by Oscar Pettersson (G.A. Eagles).

After VAR review the ref signals the yellow
card is cancelled but now issues a red.
Calvin Twigt (G.A. Eagles) has to leave
the pitch!

Here is a change. Mathis Suray is going
off and Melvin Boel gives the last tactical
orders to Yassir Salah Rahmouni (G.A. Eagles).

Oscar Pettersson goes off the pitch and
Julius Dirksen (G.A. Eagles) comes on.

Melvin Boel has decided to substitute Victor
Edvardsen and he is replaced by Melle Meulensteen
(G.A. Eagles).

Victor Edvardsen (G.A. Eagles) gets a yellow
card, off the field.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Ivan Marquez Alvarez
(Sittard) is coming onto the pitch as Shawn
Adewoye cannot continue after picking up
an injury.

Danny Buijs prepares a substitution. Ivo
Pinto is replaced by Luka Tunjic (Sittard).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Kristoffer Peterson trots
off the pitch and is replaced by Makan Aiko
(Sittard).

Rob Dieperink shows a yellow card to Jasper
Dahlhaus (Sittard), who isn't surprised
as the tackle was really hard and late.

Gerrit Nauber (G.A. Eagles) has too much
to say to the referee and receives a yellow
card.

Goal! Luka Tunjic (Sittard) shows good awareness
inside the box as he latches on to a brilliant
pass and fires a first-time shot into the
back of the net. Makan Aiko assisted in
the goal. 2:1.

The referee signals a substitution. Finn
Stokkers (G.A. Eagles) is brought on as
a substitute for Evert Linthorst.

A yellow card for a tackle by Edouard Michut
(Sittard). Rob Dieperink doesn't hesitate
at all to make this decision.

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Edouard Michut will be replaced by Tristan
Schenkhuizen (Sittard).

It's a goal! Dean Ruben James delivers a
teasing cross from the resulting corner
and the ball falls into the space where
Gerrit Nauber (G.A. Eagles) is lurking.
His close-range shot goes into the net and
it's 2:2.
